node.display_long_description:
OhShape是一款能够带来独一无二全身活动的音乐节奏类游戏。每张地图都需要躲避障碍，打击墙壁和做出可爱造型。通过游戏获取奖励，做自己的超级明星。

官方支持定制歌曲

享受前所未有的畅快感觉，享受无穷无尽的快乐。

OhShape给所有家庭带来快乐。通过4个不同难度的关卡和许多游戏设置，您能够定制适合自己技术的体验，并且感受不断练习带来的提升。

关键特色：

• 充满乐趣的全身锻炼体验
• 32个精雕细琢关卡，4个不同难度
• 派对模式：和家人，朋友一起参与游戏
• 练习模式：联系关卡中的一个片段
• 为最活跃用户提供的挑战模式
• 容易上手的定制歌曲关卡编辑器
• 跨平台在线排行榜

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
v 1.8.5 - Tiësto Update - March 2021
—————————————————————
• New Song: Added ‘Show me’ song from Tiësto to Electro Party DLC for free!
• Some feedback improvements upon failing and passing a wall
• Shadow improvements: your human shadow behaves more accurately!
• Found some little bugs, and splashed them!

node.display_short_description: The new "Electro Party" music pack takes you into a wild party with upbeat electronic music, vibrant moving elements, and electricity. A lot of electricity. With the first dark environment, give in to the lights, adrenaline, and dance to powerful tracks such as "PumpUpTheBass" and "Detonate". Let your emotions out, and party with OhShape!

purchase_alerts.message: 这是附加内容，需要有主游戏 (OhShape) 才能玩

node.name: Album 4 Electro Party - Radio Love - Expert - 1.2x Speed - 1.1x Precision

nodes.title: OhShape v 1.8.5 + New Tiësto Update
nodes.body_text:
Community feedback is key element fo us, so we have made some fine tuning to the feedback players receive when they fail a wall. Now it is clearer and less intrusive! The human shadow has also taken some dance lessons and it now moves better than ever!

On top of that, our Electro Party DLC owners will receive a free update with a new song: 'Show Me' by Tiësto.

Here is a brief summary of the release notes for this update:

v 1.8.5 - Tiësto Update - March 2021
—————————————————————
- New Song: Added ‘Show Me’  by Tiësto to Electro Party DLC for free!
- Some feedback improvements upon failing and passing a wall
- Shadow improvements: your human shadow behaves more accurately!
- Found some little bugs, and splashed them

nodes.title: OhShape Update brings the Electro Party DLC, Challenges and more
nodes.body_text:
Holidays are around the corner and OhShape has just released a very special update to celebrate! The main course of this update is the first ever DLC “Electro Party”, a music pack that takes you into a wild party with upbeat electronic music, vibrant moving elements, and electricity. A lot of electricity! This new album features a dark environment that resembles an epic disco stage, something widely demanded by the OhShape community. The Electro Party music pack includes 8 new songs:

-"Attack" by Red City Hero
-"Detonate" by Stretched
-"Is This All There" by Arch Tremors
-"Keeping Love Alive" by Guest of Rapture
-"Pump Up The Bass" by Fassounds
-"Radio Love" by Tyler Fiore
-"Save Me" by Kiba
-"The One" by Fassounds

The Electro Party DLC is available for $2.99 on the Oculus Quest and Steam, with the PSVR version coming soon at the same price.


Challenges in Oculus Quest

From now on, Quest players will also enjoy the Challenges feature where each week they will be able to join 2 exclusive challenges with different songs and modifiers, each featuring a different leaderboard. Players can compete on the global leaderboard and can challenge a friend to beat their score. Let the true competition begin!


Newcomers welcome!

The Odders Lab team has been doing a deep research around the feedback received from the community and some adjustments have been made so the new players can have a better experience with OhShape. There is a new difficulty naming that provides a clearer information about the challenge and the skills the player needs to master each level.

node.reviewDescription:
This is great fun, and if you’re looking for apps that give you a medium cardio workout, this should definitely be part of your collection. Three suggestions:
1. Can we please have a female-shaped shadow figure for aligning your body with the holes, or at least a more gender-neutral one? I find the exaggerated neck and shoulder musculature of the overtly male shadow figure, with whom I bear little resemblance, quite irritating
2. A non-stop mode - or levels with a longer duration - would be great. Too much opportunity to catch one’s breath right now!
3. Better music. Compared with Beat Sabre, the music in this app is well below par.

developerResponse.body:
Hello Helenn,

Thanks for your feedback, we are happy you are enjoying OhShape. About your suggestions:

1. We have noted this feedback and we will see if we can make a more gender neutral shadow in future updates.
2. There will be a 'playlist' feature in future updates, with that you will be able to play as much songs as you want without having to go bat to the menu.
3. We are always adding music and we will release more thematic DLC as Electro Party, so keep an eye on our updates. On top of that, you can play with custom songs just draggin and dropping files on the Songs folder.
